tharagaye siwuwani dinaya wu eeye diwa aaharaya sandaha tharagaya nathara karana wita kadulu 3 k dawi lakunu 40 k laba siti dakunu aprikanu kandayama, the panaya sandaha tharagaya nathara karana wita lakunu 182 kata kadulu 6 k dawi itha asiru thaththwayakata pathwa sitiyeya.

mita wasara 15 kata pera sahallu dumriya sandaha wu ohuge yojanawa rajaye niladharinge nosalakilla hethuwen kunu kudayata giya bawa dutu wita thama itha kanagatuwata pathwu bawath ema wyapruthiyama dan mathu wi athi bawath ohu pawasiya. 2004 di mayikro kars samagama wisin shri lankawe nishpadanaya kirima sandaha itha aarthika piriwayakin lanka ikono rel sankalpaya salasum karana lada athara eya 2004 di kabinat mandalaya wisin anumatha karana lada namuth niladhariwadaya hethuwen idiriyata gena ya nohaki wiya.

sankramanika rallak patan ganimen 1628 di masachusets be janawasaya pihituwana ladi. 1634 weddi nawa engalanthaya yayi handinwena bhumi pedes hi piyuritan yayi salakena wasiyan 10,000 k padinchi wi sitiyaha. 1620 aga bhagaye di saha amerikan aragalaye di, aparadhakaruwan 50,000 k brithanya amerikan janawasayanta naw mangin ewana ladi. 1614 aarambhaye di, oolanda jathikayan hadsan ganga pahathin saha manhatan dupathe niw amstardam hi padinchi wi sitiyaha.
